channel.title: Teachings on Tyler H. McCormick
channel.description: Recent content in Teachings on Tyler H. McCormick

item.title: Teaching & mentoring
item.description: If you’re interested in working with me please see here for more information. Postdoctoral scholars Tim Thomas (2017-2019), now at the Berkeley Urban Displacement Project. Gwen Eadie (2017-2019), now Assistant Professor of Statistics & Astronomy at the University of Toronto. Tsuyoshi Kunihama (2016-2017), now Assistant Professor in the Department of Economics at Kwansei Gakuin University. Ph.D. Students (committee chair) Zehang (Richard) Li, Ph.D. (2018, currently postdoctoral scholar at Yale Biostatistics) Mengjie Pan (2019, currently at Facebook) Wesley Lee (2019, currently at Facebook) Masters and undergraduate students Alina Arseniev-Koehler, UW Sociology undergraduate thesis, now Ph.
